snippet: Mohamed Osman Mohamud was found guilty of pushing a button that turned out to be an F.B.I. decoy device at a Christmas tree lighting ceremony in 2010 in Portland.
abstract: Jury finds Somali-American Mohamed Osman Mohamud guilty of attempting to use weapon of mass destruction; he tried to trigger what he thought was a car bomb that turned out to be an FBI decoy device at a Christmas tree lighting ceremony in 2010 in Portland, Ore.
lead_paragraph: Mohamed Osman Mohamud was found guilty of pushing a button that turned out to be an F.B.I. decoy device at a Christmas tree lighting ceremony in 2010 in Portland.

headline.seo: Man, 21, Convicted in Oregon Bomb Plot
headline.main: Oregon Man Convicted in Holiday Bombing Plot
headline.print_headline: Oregon Man Convicted In Holiday Bombing Plot
